Check a\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/tc-best-practices\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"full list of TC best\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"practices\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"and explore recommended processes, templates and other artifacts for different types of Technology Consulting activities. Every artifact available there has been proven in practice on real projects by real people within the EPAM ecosystem and processes. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":487427,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f204bf0f-ae08-4dbc-b7a9-98de6c0ad2f3/Image3 (1).PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f204bf0f-ae08-4dbc-b7a9-98de6c0ad2f3/Image3 (1).PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Image3 (1).PNG\",\"name\":\"Image3 (1).PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f204bf0f-ae08-4dbc-b7a9-98de6c0ad2f3\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1055,\"height\":294.6978984238179},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These best practices can be used as a guideline with “Recommended next steps” or “What options are available” in a certain process. Got a problem? Check available options in the appropriate Best Practice table — and go ahead to apply the most applicable recommendations depending on your project specifics.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As TC best practices is a continuously updated source of knowledge, you are welcome to share your personal experience and improve them by emailing to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:OrgTechnologyConsultingInitiative@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:orgtechnologyexcellenceinitiative@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Org Technology Excellence Initiative\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
